dt: {bc}{a_link|intruding} where one is not welcome or invited
{bc}having been forced while in a plastic state into cavities or between layers
{bc}having nothing that corresponds to a sound or letter in orthography or etymon

pt: {sc}impertinent{/sc} {sc}officious{/sc} {sc}meddlesome{/sc} {sc}intrusive{/sc} {sc}obtrusive{/sc} mean given to thrusting oneself into the affairs of others. {sc}impertinent{/sc} implies exceeding the bounds of propriety in showing interest or curiosity or in offering advice.
{sc}officious{/sc} implies the offering of services or attentions that are unwelcome or annoying.
{sc}meddlesome{/sc} stresses an annoying and usually prying interference in others' affairs.
{sc}intrusive{/sc} implies a tactless or otherwise objectionable thrusting into others' affairs.

pt.t: tried to be helpful without being {it}intrusive{/it}

pt: {sc}obtrusive{/sc} stresses improper or offensive conspicuousness of interfering actions.

pt.t: expressed an {it}obtrusive{/it} concern for his safety

shortdef: intruding where one is not welcome or invited
